modules.description: Provides functions for reading from and writing to network flows, including handling errors and shutting down connections. Operates on `flow` objects, `Cstruct.t` buffers, and custom error types for read and write operations. Used to manage data transmission in networked applications, ensuring proper error handling and resource cleanup.

Provides functions to read from and write to a flow, with explicit handling of errors and write errors through pretty-printers. Operates on `flow` objects and `Cstruct.t` buffers, supporting both single and vectorized writes. Used to manage network communication, ensuring proper closure and error recovery after I/O operations.

Provides HTTP request and response parsing, serialization, and handling using Angstrom and Faraday. Works with byte sequences, strings, and custom protocol structures. Enables building high-throughput web servers and clients with efficient memory management.

Handles HTTP connections by establishing a request handler that processes incoming requests using a provided socket. Operates on socket type and request data structures specific to the Httpun library. Used to build custom HTTP servers with tailored request and error handling logic.
